title: App Development with Docker
description:
This workshop was recorded live. Some live elements have been cut out for your enjoyment. Be sure to make use of the timestamps below. Enjoy!

00:00 Introduction 
5:58 Simple Deployments 
8:06 Monorepo vs. Polyrepo and Exploring Docker Compose 
24:08 Environment Specific Data 
40:06 Exploring Docker Files 
53:52 Debug Containerised Applications 
1:00:22 Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery 
1:30:21 Testing, Testing 
1:38:57 Wrap up

github.com/datastaxdevs/docker-learning-path
